mapper.insert: insert into category values (null, '미분류', '미분류입니다.', now(), #{id },'Y',(SELECT IFNULL(MAX(c.count) + 1, 1) from category c where c.bid = #{id }))
mapper.select: select c.no , c.name , c.explanation , date_format(c.wdate,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as wdate , c.bid , c.count from category c, blog b where c.bid = b.uid and b.uid = #{id } and c.status= 'Y' order by wdate asc
